mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO MEMBER_TB (member_no, member_id, member_pass, member_nick, member_email, member_gender, member_birth, member_reg_dt, member_admin, member_like) VALUES (MEMBER_TB_SEQ.nextval, #{member_id}, #{member_pass}, #{member_nick}, #{member_email}, #{member_gender}, #{member_birth}, sysdate, #{member_admin}, #{member_like})
SELECT NVL(MAX(member_no), 0) FROM MEMBER_TB
